ResearchProjectDef.label: Automatic Enemy Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research an enemy detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching when an enemy is found.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch when an enemy is detected.
NOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!
